colour.models.BT2020_COLOURSPACE¶

colour.models.BT2020_COLOURSPACE = RGB_Colourspace(ITU-R BT.2020, [[ 0.708, 0.292], [ 0.17 , 0.797], [ 0.131, 0.046]], [ 0.3127, 0.329 ], D65, [[ 6.36958048e-01, 1.44616904e-01, 1.68880975e-01], [ 2.62700212e-01, 6.77998072e-01, 5.93017165e-02], [ 4.99410657e-17, 2.80726930e-02, 1.06098506e+00]], [[ 1.71665119, -0.35567078, -0.25336628], [-0.66668435, 1.61648124, 0.01576855], [ 0.01763986, -0.04277061, 0.94210312]], <function oetf_BT2020>, <function eotf_BT2020>, False, False)¶

ITU-R BT.2020 colourspace.
